title: Second Lady Karen Pence’s Efforts to Raise Awareness On Licensing Reform for Military Spouses – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Veterans	

Issued on:
October 22, 2020
Today, Mrs. Pence continues to collaborate with government, private, and non-profit organizations to create employment solutions for our nation’s military spouses.Below is a look at some of the occupational licensing reform accomplishments made under the Trump Administration:ENCOURAGING GOVERNORS, STATE, AND MILITARY LEADERS to address licensing reform and reduce barriers to employment for military spouses.
